org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.partitioner

类 FlinkKafkaDelegatePartitioner<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.partitioner.FlinkKafkaPartitioner<T>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.partitioner.FlinkKafkaDelegatePartitioner<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    已过时。 
    Delegate for KafkaPartitioner, use FlinkKafkaPartitioner instead

    @Deprecated
public class FlinkKafkaDelegatePartitioner<T>
extends FlinkKafkaPartitioner<T>
    Delegate for the deprecated KafkaPartitioner. This should only be used for bridging deprecated partitioning API methods.
    另请参阅:

      • open

        public void open(int parallelInstanceId,
                 int parallelInstances)
        已过时。 
        从类复制的说明: FlinkKafkaPartitioner
        Initializer for the partitioner. This is called once on each parallel sink instance of the Flink Kafka producer. This method should be overridden if necessary.
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 FlinkKafkaPartitioner<T>
        参数:
        parallelInstanceId - 0-indexed id of the parallel sink instance in Flink
        parallelInstances - the total number of parallel instances

      • partition

        public int partition(T next,
                     byte[] serializedKey,
                     byte[] serializedValue,
                     java.lang.String targetTopic,
                     int[] partitions)
        已过时。 
        从类复制的说明: FlinkKafkaPartitioner
        Determine the id of the partition that the record should be written to.
        指定者:
        partition 在类中 FlinkKafkaPartitioner<T>
        参数:
        next - the record value
        serializedKey - serialized key of the record
        serializedValue - serialized value of the record
        targetTopic - target topic for the record
        partitions - found partitions for the target topic
        返回:
        the id of the target partition
